Articles.Content:
Now i have a simple yet challenging idea, it needs the KAS mod and a life support mod and a resource harvesting mod And extraplanetary launchpads,

Place jeb down alone on another planet (Tylo perhaps) with nothing but a KAS storage container on his back, The container is filled with supplies like mining drills oxygen tanks (Feel free to mod the container so all this fits ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) ) and other assorted stuff, Then you must make your way completely EVE all the way to one of the planets recourse hotspots living off the smaller hotspots you encounter along the way, Once you get there you must use the recources there to construct a rocket to send jeb home.

Please dont hurt me if this happens to be impossible. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
This is impossible. You need more then oxygen for EVA'ed kerbals. Plus, you can't mine life support with Karbonite or anything like that. Make it...possible. This is a great idea though.
Your right it was just a long shot anyway, I thought that placeing a kerbal down on a planet with a few small supplies and then using those supplies to eventually get was a good idea.
